CANDIDATE     Habiba Mahmoud Eletr  
 
 
 
PERSONAL DETAILS   
 
Loication:   UAE  
 
QUALIFICATIONS  
 
Bachelor of Arts, English Department, Cairo University, EG, 2013. Grade: B+ Modern 
Narmer Language School, Mathematics section, 2009  
 
 
CAREER SUMMARY  
 
May 2019 till present : Firmenich, UAE   
Position: HR Generalist  MENA  
 
World’s largest privately owned Fragrance and Taste company. Firmenich  ranks no. 1 
worldwide in Fine Fragrance and Ingredients. With 10,000 employees, presence in 
100+ markets and CHF 3.9bn+ group turnover in FY20.  
 
• Partner with the business ensuring HR proximity, leading transformation,  and 
people growth  
• Deliver on HR  functional excellence, managing the full employee cycle and ensuring 
positive employee experience  
• lead recruitment to support the business growth while driving effective 
collaboration with business on talent pipeline  
• Review the Attraction and Recrui tment Policy. Build and implement Employer 
branding regional strategy  
• Implement the new performance management system focusing on performance 
and behavioural  goals and ongoing feedback  
• Lead Rewards ( benchmarking process, benefits review, compensation , Annual 
Salary Review, conduct salary surveys)  
• Inclusive Diversity Champion for the Middle East region, responsible to implement 
Middle East roadmap  
• Implement controversial HR policies (extended maternity leave, working from 
home, flexi hours, increased paternity leave and company products to all 
employees).  
    
• Manage the Pulse Survey to drive attraction and engagement  
• Train people managers in rec ruiting, induction, reward, performance management, 
disciplinary and exit procedures.  
• Create and implement Training Plan at all levels. Launched L&D programs: Sales 
Development Journey, Internal Facilitators, and Executive Coaching.  
• Contribute to the  HR Regional Strategy formulation together with the HR Director.  
• Manage the implementation of the 360 Degrees Feedback Survey tool, Mentoring 
Program and Coaching Program, which leads to increased performance management 
and capabilities in the region  
• Design the local Engagement and Wellbeing annual program  
 
 
March 2018 till May 2019 : Union Insurance Company  UAE  
Position: HR Business Partner  
 
• Own the recruitment and selection process; sourcing, selecting, and onboarding 
employees  
• Lead a team of 2 HR prof essionals; HRIS Specialist and HR Operations Senior Officer  
• Own the revamping of the performance management process & forms and deliver 
trainings to HQ  
• Provide support to managers to retain employees, reduce labour  turn over and 
encourage internal pr omotion (Succession Planning)  
• Assist in strategy development, planning and execution of Positive Employee 
Relations initiatives  
• Actively identify HR processes and policies gaps, propose,  and implement changes 
necessary  
• Design and maintain organization structure as the performance of the business 
unit improves  
• Design and implement diverse HR projects and exercises,  Employer Branding, 
Employee Referral Program, Emiratization, Candidate Experience and Employee 
Engageme nt  
• Manage and execute monthly payroll process. Develop payroll implementation on 
the HR system  
• Design and manage benefits plan in terms of Corporate Mobile Plans deals, 
Medical Insurance Plans and Benefits, Housing Allowance, Car Allowance, Bonus, 
cost of living Increment etc..  
• Run the performance appraisal exercise biannually and prepare the bonus and 
profit share  
 
 
July 2016 till March 2017 : Valeo  
Position: Recruitment Leader  
A multinational automotive supplier based in France, providing a wide range of  
products to auto manufacturers and after -markets.  
 
• Partner with stakeholders and develop recruiting strategies meeting current & 
future staffing needs  
    
• Conduct performance evaluations and career development

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
